content:
As of the morning of March 26, there are no enemy ships in the wrestle in the Black and Azov seas.

About thisinformsNavy of the Armed Forces.

In the Mediterranean, Russia holds one enemy ship - the carpet carrier "Caliber", a total volley of up to 8 rockets.

During the day, in the interests of the Russian Federation, the passage of the Kerch Strait was made:

  • 16 vessels to the Azov Sea, 3 of them moved from the Bosphorus Strait;
  • To the Black Sea - 6 vessels, none of them continued the movement in the direction of the Bosphorus.

The Russian Federation continues to violate the International Convention on the Protection of Human Life at the Sea of 1974 (Solas), switching off automatic identification systems (AIS).

As reported by the Armyinform, the air forces knocked down all12 "Shahaneda"by which Russia attacked Ukraine.
title: Russia did not bring any ship in the Black and Azov Seas
description: The Navy informs about it. In the Mediterranean, Russia holds one enemy ship - a carrier ...
author: Army Inform
